title: BULLET FOR MY VALENTINE Is Recording Their First New Album Since 2021
description: 2025 is a big one for Bullet For My Valentine.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 10 hours ago
excerpt: 2025 is a big one for Bullet For My Valentine.
text: Bullet For My Valentine is set to have a huge 2025. Not only will the band embark on a world tour celebrating their 2005 album The Poison alongside Trivium, they've also got a new album in the works! Bullet For My Valentine is once again working with producer Carl Bown (Bring Me the Horizon, Sleep Token), who produced Venom, Gravity, and Bullet For My Valentine. Trivium and Bullet For My Valentine will be out on the road in 2025 celebrating the 20th anniversary of their albums Ascendancy and The Poison. There are quite a few dates, all of which you can get below. Tickets are available here.
